author: Amy Davidson
title: Mercury Prize 2015: Florence + the Machine, Wolf Alice and Aphex Twin among nominees - Music
text: The 2015 Mercury Prize shortlist is in, and albums by Florence + the Machine, Wolf Alice and Aphex Twin are among this year's nominees.Jamie XX, Slaves, Ghostpoet, C Duncan and ESKA are also up for the prestigious gong.The Mercury Prize aims to promote 'the best of UK and Irish music and the artists who produce it".Judges on this year's panel include musicians like Anna Calvi and Nick Mulvey, DJs such as Mistajam, and a number of music editors.Last year's Mercury Prize was awarded to Scottish group Young Fathers for their album DEAD. Â© Getty Images / Lorne Thomson/RedfernsWolf Alice Lauren Laverne will host this year's Mercury Prize awards show, which will take place on Friday, November 20 in the Radio Theatre at Broadcasting House.The full list of nominees is as follows:Aphex Twin: SyroWolf Alice: My Love Is CoolRoisin Murphy: Hairless ToysC Duncan: ArchitectESKA: EskaFlorence + the Machine: How Big, How Blue, How BeautifulGhostpoet: Shedding SkinBenjamin Clementine: At Least for NowJamie xx: In ColourSoak: Before We Forgot How to DreamGaz Coombes: MatadorSlaves: Are You Satisfied?What do you think of this year's shortlist? Let us know in the comments box below:
